title: Mini-Ep 258: It’s Not That Deep
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 258: It’s Not That Deep
itunes:subtitle: Kate heeds Doree’s mantra, “it’s just not that deep,” and Doree tells the tale of her comedic but awful travels. Then, listeners send their praise for an OG Forever35 product rec, give a revolutionary make-up brush cleaning hack, and recommend becoming...
description:
Kate heeds Doree’s mantra, “it’s just not that deep,” and Doree tells the tale of her comedic but awful travels. Then, listeners send their praise for an OG Forever35 product rec, give a revolutionary make-up brush cleaning hack, and recommend becoming someone else’s brag recipient. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:
